location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 14 of 1822 from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, at Sheraz [Shiraz] to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Public Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a circular (No 226 of 1822). In response, it states that the general books for the Bushire Residency for the year 1820/21 have been transmitted to Bombay, and that the books for the past official year will be drawn up once the Resident has returned to Bushire.
